scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a skeletal figure, representing Death, standing to the left and a robed woman, possibly a nun or a devout laywoman, to the right. Death holds a staff and gestures towards the woman. The woman holds a book and appears to be looking at Death. Above them, an architectural canopy is visible, adorned with decorative elements and flanked by skulls and bones. The overall composition suggests a contemplation of mortality and the inevitability of death.
